input.sentences: [male] was hanging out with his friends watching the big game .
[male] brought over some location scorpion pepper wings | but did not warn anyone .
[male] had a severe allergic reaction to the peppered wings !
his airway started to swell and everything started to blur as they rushed him to the er .
this is the last thing poor [male] ever saw .
output.sentences: It was Sunday and the guys were all at Matt's house.
The guys were watching the football game.
They got hungry and decided to have some chicken wings with ranch sauce.
Matt had so many beers, he had to lay down on the floor.
They decided to make Matt buy more beer, so they drove him to a gas station to buy some.
